description: Vintage-inspired shorts made from camo-print cotton. Heavily stone-washed. Double-entry cargo pockets.
fitting_details: All sizes have an 8" inseam. Size 32W has a 9¾" rise.
Belt loops. Embroidered eyelets at the waistband. Side adjusters. Button fly with a buttoned closure.
Double-entry cargo pockets at the thighs. Two back buttoned pockets.
